sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Zashi + Keystone Hardware Wallet integration is live!
Connect your Keystone wallet with Zashi.
Sign a transaction with your Keystone wallet.
Secure your shielded ZEC!

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: It is finally here! Flexa integration at your service!
Pay with Flexa at supported merchants in the US, Canada, and El Salvador.
It's waiting for you in Zashi Settings.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Hola! We taught Zashi to speak Spanish!
We adopted SDK release 2.2.7 with initial implementation of note management. This should speed up sending one transaction after another.
We implemented encryption and remote storage for Address Book!
We added device authentication on app launch.
We also added an animated progress screen and new success and failure screens. Zashi is fun again!

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: We made Settings and status screens pretty, and improved security of the Recovery Phrase screen.
We also improved Send Feedback feature, let us know how you like Zashi!

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We fixed the behaviour of the shield icon in Transaction History.
We fixed the flashlight functionality freezing the app.
We also fixed the issue with Rescan button not working.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: We have adopted SDK release 2.2.5 which includes an important fix for a note commitment tree related bug which was affecting some Zashi users for a while now.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We fixed a UX issue in the Request ZEC payer experience. After sending a transaction, we will now correctly route you back to the Account screen.
We also fixed an Address Book and Request ZEC interference issue.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Tired of copy pasting addresses? We’ve added an Address Book feature for you!
Introducing the “Request ZEC” feature: easily create a payment request and share it as a QR code!

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: The Receive tab got some love—we redesigned it based on your feedback and reported challenges.
We tweaked the Send form to align with our new design system.
We updated the transaction history to simplify your experience.
And that’s not all—the Scan UI has been redesigned, too.
We also made many other minor UI/UX tweaks and fixes along the way. Enjoy!

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added an experimental feature which allows you to buy ZEC with Coinbase Onramp integration, you can find it in the Advanced Settings.
No need to keep guessing which server performs best. We added a dynamic server switch, which identifies the best performing servers for you.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: We updated our Settings UI.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We adopted the latest Zcash SDK version 2.2.1 with migration fixes.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added ZEC/USD currency conversion to Zashi which doesn't compromise your IP address.
You can now view your balances, and type in the transaction amount in both USD and ZEC.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: We adopted the latest Zcash SDK version 2.2.0, which brings ZIP 320 TEX addresses support, fetching ZEC/USD exchange rate over Tor, and support for restoring the full history from transparent-only wallets.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added an experimental feature which allows you to buy ZEC with Coinbase Pay integration. Find it in Advanced Settings.
We improved UX for unsent transactions. The SDK now checks whether there are any unsent transactions, and it attempts to resubmit such transactions every 5 minutes.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We fixed UI for unread transactions with memos, they are properly marked with a yellow icon again.
Sometimes, the memo was missing in the transaction history, and sometimes it disappeared when the transaction state changed. We fixed both cases!

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added a screen with syncing tips for successful Restore.
We added a logic which prevents iPhone from sleeping while restoring and plugged-in.
We made Zashi smarter. When it experiences connection issues or server performance issues, it displays a modal routing you to switch a server.
We also added a Disconnected label for such situations, so you know what's happening.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We optimized Zashi's startup pipeline and significantly improved performance. Zashi now features faster cold and warm starts, and the transaction history is populated almost instantly.
Transaction messages are now checked for duplicity and removed if duplicates are found.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Expanded transaction now supports displaying multiple memos.
We improved security - user authentication is now required for Deleting Zashi, Exporting Private Data, and for confirmation of Send.
Tapping on the error message label in the sync progress widget shows an alert view with the details of the error to help troubleshooting.
What's New aka Changelog is now accessible from Settings -> About.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: Sometimes, Zashi crashed when the shield button was tapped because of an unhandled error. We fixed the crash and we now handle the error with insufficient funds.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Highly requested ^[dark mode](style: 'bold') functionality added. Turn it on by switching into dark mode in your device settings. Enjoy!
Scan QR code from an image stored in your photo library.
Security feature added - ^[hide your balances](style: 'bold') and transaction history with an eye icon on the Account and Balances tabs.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: The copy on the confirmation button of the secret recovery phrase screen has been modified.
We also improved UI on the Receive screen - you can now switch between the unified and transparent address.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: Balances are refreshed right after the send or shielding transaction are processed.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added autoscroll, so you can quickly realize which server is currently selected.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: We have updated our server list with zec.rocks servers and Ywallet servers.
Custom server option has been moved up to improve accessibility.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We fixed a bug issue with displaying the recovery seed phrase twice after creating a new wallet.

sections.title: Removed:
bulletpoints: Lighwalletd servers have been removed from the server options since they are scheduled to phase out at the end of May. If you face issues, go may to Advanced settings, and choose a different server.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added a button to the scan QR UI which will lead a user to their device settings if their camera is disabled for Zashi.
A new security tweak hides Zashi content once you send the app to the background, so you don't accidentally expose anything you don't want to.
We auto-focused the wallet birthday height field to improve UX during Restore.
We also made the Restore label persistent until the wallet is fully synced.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: Migration of DB ensures that the default Unified Address for existing wallets now contains an Orchard receiver.

We updated the experience to display a message when the user doesn't have enough free space (1GB) to operate Zashi. We show the amount of free space available and provide a link to Zashi Settings where the user can obtain their recovery phrase if needed.
The syncing label UI has been unified.
The input field for the secret recovery phrase now shows the expected format in the placeholder. We hope you love the example!
We also removed a redundant copy from the expanded transparent transaction view.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We did some general cleanup and fixed some bugs.
The Delete Zashi function now resets local in-memory values.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Transparent balance got added up to the Total Balance, gone are those nasty zeros.
You asked, and we did it! We added a Tap to Copy button for memo.
We also added an animation to the Tap to Copy transaction ID button, so now you will know that it works.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We fixed the issue causing errors during the syncing process. Orchard subtree roots are now fetched alongside Sapling subtree roots.
We also improved behavior of the shielding box tooltip.

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: We added a Delete Wallet function but we hope you'll never use it.

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: We fixed an error in the shielding functionality, feel free to test it out.
We also fixed a bug in note selection when sending to a transparent recipient.

sections.title: Changed:
bulletpoints: Advanced Settings were added, for advanced users. You know who you are.
The design and behavior for scanning QR codes was updated because it was pretty clunky before.
Available balance now shows a spinner when processing spendable balance — to let you know it's working!

sections.title: Added:
bulletpoints: Orchard support was added. Orchard is the latest, most secure Zcash shielded pool.
The Choose a Server feature is now available in Settings, and it includes pre-defined servers and custom server setup. You won't need to use this feature often, but just in case.
Zashi's device-migration process was improved to retain full history, relieve user anxiety, and avoid the necessity of full rescan.
The Proposal API was integrated with error handling for multi-transaction proposals.
Account tab UI tweaks were implemented for user wallets with an empty state, no transaction history. This is nothing to be ashamed of — everyone starts here!

sections.title: Fixed:
bulletpoints: Extra padding was removed in the keyboard UI.
The Restore mode label was missing when Zashi was deleted and reinstalled. Scary, but all good now.
The padding in Zashi's syncing bar was tweaked in the Restore mode.
The Exit button on the backup phrase screen when no words are stored in the keychain has been updated.
Failed transactions no longer appear at the top of the transaction history. Now they are slated in with the other transactions at around the time they failed.
The synchronization progress bar starts at the expected percentage now. We think Zashi users will like this much better than the previous, broken experience.
The iPhone SE recovery phrase screen is not trailing words anymore.
All security audit issues have been resolved.

sections.title: Removed:
bulletpoints: Pull to refresh the transaction history.
